thread.title: Tani
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Tani

author: Tani
title: Tani
text: I have been purchasing from White Mountain for a few years and every experience has been fantastic. The puzzles are quality made and there is a good selection. The shipping is always fast and they keep you informed on the progress of your order. I would highly recommend them.
